name: Mahjong and Ball by SZY
description:
Be quick to search identical mahjong tiles.
Be skillful at controling the ball.
Be careful to avoid dice.
Be patient to wait for chances.
Be proficient in hitting the tiles.
Be firm to challenge final success.

Use the ball to remove two identical tile as quickly as possible. It is fun and exciting. Start to enjoy it now.

Youtube Demo: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hI-mneNebpE

*Three different levels of Beginner, Normal and Expert.
*Auto saves game.
*Supports Chinese, English, Japanese and Traditional Chinese, French, German, Italian, Dutch, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian and Swedish.
*Supports leaderboard of Game Center with categories of completion and best time.
*Supports local leadearboard of best time.
